output.sentences: Two bikers were biking around San Francisco and saw the Golden Gate Bridge.
They decided to bike all the way up the tall bridge.
They were in awe of how big it was up close!
As they continued their bike ride they saw the beauty of the countryside.
It was hard biking all the way around town but the view made it worth it.
